name: @ROI_modal_grow
author: AFNI Developers
description: Script to grow a set of regions in a volumetric dataset using modal smoothing.

inputs.description: Required input dataset. This dataset should be a set of integer values, assuming approximate isotropic voxels.
inputs.name: Input dataset

inputs.description: Number of iterations for modal growth, generally making sense for values from about 1-10.
inputs.name: Number of iterations

inputs.description: Directory name for output. All output goes to this directory. Default is rmgrow.
inputs.name: Output directory

inputs.description: Mask dataset at the same grid as the input dataset. Could be a dilated version of the original mask or a larger region like a cortical ribbon mask. Not required but often desirable.
inputs.name: Mask dataset

inputs.description: Base name of the final output dataset, i.e., baseprefix.nii.gz. Default is rmg, so output would be rmg.nii.gz.
inputs.name: Output prefix

inputs.description: Neighborhood type used in finding mode. 1 - facing neighbors, 2 - edges, 3 - corners.
inputs.name: Neighborhood type
